trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_00<tab>Naldiq & Vymelli's shipwright Hezzkhezl needs help heating his rivets.
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_01<tab>Journey outside of the Moraby Drydocks and slay three lightning sprites for their cores.
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_02<tab>You have collected three intact cores. Now deliver them to Hezzkhezl.

TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_03<tab>Hezzkhezl is delighted at your return, and tells you that it was <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> foreman Ahtbyrm who originally conceived the idea of using sprite cores to heat rivets.
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_TODO_00<tab>Slay lightning sprites and obtain their cores.
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the elemental cores to Hezzkhezl.

TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_1<tab>When it comes to rivetin', ye could search the realm over, but ye won't find none better than Hezzkhezl. Ten score rivets a bell, I drive. Twice that if I'm not in me cups!

TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_2<tab>The key to drivin' rivets proper-like is how hot ye can get the buggers. The hotter the rivet, the stronger the bond she'll make with the steel plate. Problem bein', was I to heat me rivets in the forge, they'd be cold as a dead whore's crotch by the time I hauled 'em back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_3<tab>'Tis why I use the white-hot cores o' lightnin' sprites...but as ye can see, me supply's runnin' a tad low. If it ain't too much trouble, would ye be so kind as to fetch me some? Ye look as if ye could take on a whole pack o' sprites with one hand tied behind yer arse.
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_10<tab>Three cores, and I can be done with the day's work and back at the alehouse, where I belong.
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_11<tab>Leviathan's eye! Ye really done gone an' fetched me the blinkin' cores! Ahtbyrm'll be right pleased to see that, he will.

TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_12<tab>'Twas the foreman what came up with the idea to use cores to heat the rivets. A clever one, that man. Sharper than a fang in a fishback's beak. Probably is why he made chief so quick, like.
